descriptions.temperature: Controls randomness. Lower = more focused, higher = more creative
descriptions.top_p: Nucleus sampling. Use with low temperature for best results
descriptions.frequency_penalty: Penalizes repeated tokens. Positive = less repetition
descriptions.presence_penalty: Penalizes new topics. Positive = more focused on topic
descriptions.seed: For reproducible outputs. Leave empty for random generation
